body.name: SEEN Deeper Conditioner, Fragrance Free - Non-Comedogenic & Sulfate-Free Hair Conditioner- Dermatologist-Developed - Safe for Sensitive, Eczema & Acne Prone Skin
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 22 hrs 42 mins
features: WHAT IT IS: A dermatologist-developed, fragrance free, vegan, non-comedogenic shampoo that is gentle yet effective. Fragrance free SEEN Shampoo is sulfate free and provides luxurious lather that rinses easily without leaving the hair or scalp feeling stripped. You’ll see less frizz and smoother hair. Safe for sensitive skin. Safe for acne prone skin. Safe for eczema prone skin.

FREE OF: Non-comedogenic shampoo that is safe for sensitive skin and formulated without fragrances, sulfates, silicones, phthalates, parabens, dyes, pore-clogging oils, formaldehyde-releasing preservatives, cocamidopropyl betaine, gluten. PETA and Leaping Bunny approved.

GOOD FOR: Clean and vegan. Sulfate-free shampoo that is good for all skin and hair types. Color-safe, keratin-safe. Can be used daily. Safe for sensitive skin. Safe for eczema & acne prone skin. Reduces frizz, smooths hair and adds shine.

CLINICALLY PROVEN: Dermatologist-developed fragrance-free shampoo that is non-comedogenic (won’t clog pores) and non-irritating. Safe for sensitive skin. Safe for acne prone skin. Safe for eczema prone skin.

Fragrance Free SEEN is formulated to be truly fragrance-free. There are no essential oils in any SEEN products, scented or Fragrance Free, and our Fragrance Free products have no fragrance or masking fragrance. You may notice the product having a slight scent that originates from the raw ingredients, but this is not an added fragrance.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SEEN Deeper Conditioner, Fragrance Free BENEFITS & FEATURES: This deeper conditioner is ideal for dry or damaged hair. It replenishes moisture and reduces frizz. When used as a regimen, SEEN products deliver stronger, smoother, healthier-looking hair.Developed specifically to be safe for sensitive, acne-prone, and eczema-prone skinAwarded the National Eczema Association Seal of AcceptanceFormulated without sulfates, silicones, phthalates, parabens, dyes, pore-clogging oils, formaldehyde-releasing preservatives, or gluten

KEY INGREDIENTS: Bisabolol: a naturally-derived ingredient with skin-soothing properties Hemisqualane: a plant sugar-derived alternative to silicone that reduces frizz, and keeps hair looking and feeling smooth HOW TO USE: 1. After using fragrance-free SEEN Shampoo, apply a quarter-sized amount or more (depending on hair length), focusing on the mid-lengths and ends. Leave on for 2-3 minutes and rinse. For deeper conditioning, leave on for 5-10 minutes before rinsing. 2. Follow with fragrance-free SEEN styling treatments for your healthiest hair and skin yet!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Doesn’t clog the pores but keeps hair shiny, silky and feeling super clean! Love the fresh scent as well…it’s light, bright and not overpowering at all

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the better deep conditioners I have ever used. Gives long lasting moisture to the hair. I prefer this over the regular conditioner. This and the Magic Elixir are my favorites. Will repurchase these many more times!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Warning!!! This might be a considered a lightly fragranced product but to say that it is fragrance free is a flat lie.I really wish these manufacturers would understand that their false advertising can cause actual harm to people. 0 accountability.I ordered this conditioner because I really like the serum by this company. I put the conditioner in my hand and didn't smell anything. I put the conditioner on my hair and woah-- perfume like scent!! Gave me a headache, lungs tight plus fatigue. Next time I will try it out on my arm instead of hair as it is much easier to wash out.Unfortunately this keeps happening (I'm looking at you Lume with your supposedly Unscented Deodorant). It seems I can't trust the words "unscented" and "fragrance free" anymore which is sad. What these people are doing is making money of a medically sensative group of people without providing a product that suits them. Shameful.If you're looking for truly Unscented products try No Nothing and Honest Co.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seen deep conditioner
reviews.reviewText: Love this . I don’t use but maybe once a week . It really does a great job. No fragrance, which is very important for me. Does not weight down my fine hair either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for skin, okay for hair
reviews.reviewText: I bought this conditioner after getting frustrated with scalp breakouts that I suspected were being caused by my previous drugstore conditioner. I did see an improvement after switching, so I’ve continued to use it even though the price hurts almost as much as the scalp acne did.As a conditioner, I would rate it “okay” for my thick, coarse hair. It’s not the most moisturizing or smoothing conditioner I’ve used, but it does well enough. You do need to leave it on for several minutes in order to get the full effect - it doesn’t do much if you rinse it off right away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a fantastic product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So I can't do fragrance. It's been hard to find a condition without fragrance that is a stronger. I use to use Tresemme. Still not as good as Tresemme but I love this condition

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not fragrance free
reviews.reviewText: I am hypersensitive to ALL scented products, which causes an allergy induced asthma attack. The shampoo is fragrance free I can’t smell anything. But the Deep conditioner has a mild floral scent to it. If it is labeled fragrance free it should be fragrance free.
